text.section:
A person may not knowingly permit a motor vehicle owned by him to be driven on any highway by any person:
If the person is not authorized by this title to drive; or
Otherwise in violation of any of the provisions of this title.

A person may not knowingly permit a motor vehicle under the person's control to be driven on any highway by any person:
If the person is not authorized by this title to drive; or
Otherwise in violation of any of the provisions of this title.
